I mostly thought of the option to zip the content and reduce bandwidth

best
Bjarne Andersen

Kristinn Sigurdsson wrote:
> Not at the moment. There has been talk about making this an option, but 
> no concrete plans last time I heard. I think people were unsure how you 
> could best utilize 1.1 connections. I.e. how do you download multiple 
> documents in one connections with the current Heritrix framework. You 
> either need to add a mechanism for maintaining connections or process 
> URIs (from the same host) in batches, rather then one at a time. Either 
> approach requires serious changes to the Heritrix framework.
>  
> - Kris
>
